OOC: I hope Airly doesn't mind me controlling the defenses for the moment.  
If anyone has a problem then scrap this post.

::Chivtron Base::
       The scanners on the Chivtron base detected an unknown ship incoming 
and landing only a hundred feet away.  The automatic defense systems 
activated and the autoguns began firing on the newcomers.

--part1_97.1cddb4d1.2900e41c_boundary
